verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
D
He is our peace
Who has broken down ev'ry wall
He is our peace He is our peace
He is our peace
Who has broken down ev'ry wall
He is our peace He is our peace

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Cast all your cares on Him
For He cares for you
He is our peace He is our peace
Cast all your cares on Him
For He cares for you
He is our peace He is our peace
